title: Glitter Girls – 14-inch Doll Style Bundle – 3 Fashion Outfits – Rainbow Jacket, Cat-Ears, Sweater Dress – Clothes & Accessories – GG Fashion Pack – 3 Years +
features: 3-in-1 Fashion Pack: Explore dazzling new styles with the Glitter Girls Fashion Pack for 14-inch dolls and find your favorite! (Dolls sold separately).

Complete Outfits: Includes a cute cat ears headband, rainbow jacket, straw hat, 2 pairs of shoes, robe, pajama dress, T-shirt, overalls, hairbrush, scissors, skirt, tank top, pair of socks, pair of slippers, newspaper, mug, and treat box.
Dress Up: Easy-open closures make dressing your poseable Glitter Girls doll a snap!
Mix & Match: Compatible with most 14-inch dolls, outfits, and accessories.
Recommended Age: Kids 3 years + (small parts); perfectly sized for small hands, easy to clean, and durable for everyday play.
description: Explore dazzling new styles with this GG Fashion Pack – find your favorite! Ruffles? We’ve got ’em in rainbow colors! Staying home this Saturday? Slip on a super soft robe! Razzle? Grab some dazzle! The GG Fashion Pack has something for everyone and comes with triple the fashion fun. The Cuties in Ruffles and Pleats outfit includes an adorable rainbow jacket with cute ruffle details, casual top, sparkly pleated skirt, trendy hat, and glitter shoes. The Razzle Dazzle set includes everything to create fun new styles: cat-ear headband, striped top, overalls, glitter shoes with laces, hairbrush, and scissors. And the Wake Up with a Smile! outfit is ready for a cozy weekend and includes a doll robe, sweater dress with glittery print, pink knee-high socks, glitter shoes, dog toy newspaper roll, mug, and a box of pet treats. Sparkling choices are endless with GG Fashion Packs! How will you shine today?
